title: BIP 26: Badger/DIGG Emission Plan Part III: Liquidity Mining Program Extension
body:
TLDR;
- Gradual weekly emission reduction
- Liquidity Mining Program extends to 22 weeks after the DIGG launch
- Most of the rewards are issued in DIGG
- More rewards are distributed if Badger and DIGG grow together.

Do you approve of the Liquidity Mining Program Extension?

Link to discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-26-badger-digg-emission-plan-part-iii-liquidity-mining-program-extension/2099
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
